data.eml:eml: Two new species of Hydroptilidae (Insecta: Trichoptera) from the Serra dos Carajás, Pará state, northern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neto, Jaime De Liege Gama, Ribeiro, José Moacir Ferreira, Passos, Mahedy Araujo Bastos (2019): Two new species of Hydroptilidae (Insecta: Trichoptera) from the Serra dos Carajás, Pará state, northern Brazil. Zootaxa 4695 (4): 385-390, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4695.4.6
